article_title: Medical Debts Will Soon Weigh Less On Your Credit Score, But They're Still A Problem

article_metadata.author: Christina LaMontagne

og.description: New FICO 9 rules will improve credit scores for those with medical debt. Consumers need more financial literacy to manage their health care expenses.
